CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Rusty Kettle relative to Stellar Bistro?
SRP.A: The Rusty Kettle is {below} Stellar Bistro in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Stellar Bistro relative to The Rusty Kettle?
SRP.A: Stellar Bistro is {above} The Rusty Kettle in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {The Rusty Kettle}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Stellar Bistro}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Stellar Bistro's minimum Customer Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Stellar Bistro's minimum Customer Traffic is in {1974}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is The Rusty Kettle's minimum Customer Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: The Rusty Kettle's minimum Customer Traffic is in {1970}.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1987, did the total Customer Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 1974 and 1976?
NC.A: The change in total customer traffic between 1986 and 1987 was {smaller} than between 1974 and 1976.

NC.Q: Between 1975 and 1985, was the average total Customer Traffic higher or lower than between 1971 and 1978?
NC.A: The average total customer traffic between 1975 and 1985 was {higher} than between 1971 and 1978.

NC.Q: Was the total Customer Traffic in 1974 higher or lower than in 1979?
NC.A: The total customer traffic in 1974 was {lower} than in 1979.

NC.Q: Was the total Customer Traffic in 1974 higher or lower than in 1975?
NC.A: The total customer traffic in 1974 was {lower} than in 1975.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {The Rusty Kettle} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Stellar Bistro and The Rusty Kettle first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Stellar Bistro and The Rusty Kettle first exchanged leading positions in {1973}.
